Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Repayment of Debt: repayments of debt and capital lease obligations

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses and interest in affiliates
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments for proceeds from capitalized costs support equipment and facilities
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
Other Investing Activities: payments to acquire interest in joint venture
proceeds from divestiture and formation of joint venture
proceeds from divestiture of businesses net of cash divested
proceeds from real estate and real estate joint ventures
proceeds from sale of champion x drilling technologies business
Purchases of Investments: payments for proceeds from short term investments
purchase of blue chip swap securities
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale of blue chip securities
proceeds from sale of equity method investments
proceeds from sale of insurance investments
proceeds from sale of liberty shares
proceeds from sale of short term investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease excluding exchange rate effect
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in other current assets
increase decrease in other noncurrent assets
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in other operating liabilities
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
Net Income: income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax attributable to reporting entity
profit loss excluding noncontrolling interests associated with discontinued operations
Other Non-Cash Items: business combination bargain purchase gain recognized amount
equity method investment other than temporary impairment
equity method investment realized gain loss on disposal
gain loss on disposition of real estate discontinued operations
gain loss on formation of joint venture
gain loss on investments net of tax
gain loss on sale of business
gain loss on sale of liberty shares
income loss from equity method investments net of dividends or distributions
pension and other postretirement benefit contributions
pension and other postretirement benefit expense

__unmapped__: net cash provided by used in discontinued operations
